1.speaker: A
sentence: Dinner is ready. Come and take it!

2.speaker: B
sentence: I'll skip my dinner. I lost my appetite.
난 할꺼야 저녁 식사를 거르다. 나 식욕을 잃었어.

3.speaker: A
sentence: You shouldn't have snacked before a meal.
넌 해선 안되 군것질을 해오다 식사전에

4.speaker: B
sentence: Mon, I think this soup tastes funny.

5.speaker: A
sentence: Ok. fine. Have it your way.
